metadata.purpose: Complete system of truth for validation runner reference

changes: Added Company section features (All employees, Company assets, Company documents, Employee documents, Invitations, Knowledge hub, Task manager)
Added Payroll section features (Adjustments, Employee air tickets, Employee loans, Global salary transfers, Leave Salary, Payroll table, Transactions)
Added Finance Ops section features (Employee work expenses)
Added Time section features (Calendar, Employee attendance, Employee leaves, Employee timesheets, Shift scheduler)
Added Performance section features (Goals, Growth framework, My learning, My performance, Reviews)
Added Health section features (Billing, Employee claims, Endorsements, Getting started, My claims, My dependents, My policy info)

Added Requests section features (Air tickets, Employee tickets, Leaves, Leaves Calendar, Letters, Loans, My air tickets, My leaves, My letters, My loans, My medical claims, My tickets, My work expenses, Work Expenses)
Added Settings section features (Attendance, Bayzat Apps, Company, Custom Data, Leaves, Letter Templates, Payroll, Performance, Role management, Tickets, Work Expenses)
Enhanced Insights section with detailed AI Reports features (dashboards, reports tab, AI prompt, category filters) and Engagement features (surveys, my surveys with tabs and tables)
Enhanced Home section with detailed Newsfeed features (widgets, post interactions, celebrations, events) and Announcements features (tabs, rich text editor, draft management)
Added comprehensive UI elements taxonomy captured via Playwright browser automation

Added Employee Profile page structure under Company > All Employees with all 12 tabs: About Me, Work, Documents, Dependents, Leaves, Health Insurance, Payroll, Attendance, Timesheet, Assets, Air tickets, Performance
